description:
Checkboxes can be toggle by clicking the label of the checkbox or the
checkbox itself. If the icon itself is clicked, ink will appear. There
will be no ink when the label is clicked.

className.description: The optional className to apply to the surrounding label.

disabled.description: Boolean if the checkbox is disabled.

onChange.description:
An optional function to call when the checked state is called.
The next checked state and change event will be passed.

`onChange(!checked, event)`.

value.description: An optional value for the checkbox.

defaultChecked.description: Boolean if the checkbox is checked by default.

checked.description:
Boolean if this checkbox is currently checked. This will
require the `onChange` prop to be defined since it will
become a controlled component.

checkedIcon.description: The icon to use for the checked state.

uncheckedIcon.description: The icon to use for the unchecked state.

label.description: An optional label to display with the checkbox.

labelBefore.description: Boolean if the label should be displayed before or after the checkbox.

name.description: An optional form name to give to the checkbox.
